module_title: Module 12: Resume Building and Demo Day

introduction.level_1: Industry trend reports emphasize the increasing value of showcasing skills over just listing them on resumes.
introduction.level_2: Many companies now value GitHub contributions, live demos, and portfolio links as primary evidence of expertise.
introduction.level_3: Reports also show the demand for storytelling through projects and real-world applicability.
introduction.level_4: Advanced resumes now include QR codes to video demos and AI-generated skill analysis summaries.
